attributes.action: Reject Royal Mail proposals to ban firearm transportation
attributes.additional_details:
As detailed on their website
http://www.royalmail.com/sites/default/files/Proposals_to_prohibit_Firearms_from_postal_services.pdf, The Royal Mail are proposing changes to ban the posting of firearms, guns and component parts. This will adversely affect dealerships in the country causing job losses and closures, plus impact to consumers as there is currently no alternative. We request that this change is not approved
